attributes.comment:
I am writing to state my opposition to the proposed USCIS fee increases. I am
in the process of adopting internationally, and the fee increases would cause me
great financial hardship.

I am adopting from China, and the waiting time for China adoption has lengthened
significantly. Because the I-171H expires after 18 months, I am already
expecting to have to apply for the I-171H twice. This fee increase would
certainly cause additional financial burden, and I hope you consider my
situation along with numerous others in the same situation that you not to
increase the fees as you have proposed.

Thank you,
John
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by John
